item.title: Does homebuying make sense this fall? Pros and cons experts say to know now
item.description: Buying a home could make a lot of sense this fall, but that won't be the case for every buyer.

item.title: AI drives interest in blue-collar jobs among Gen Z: "I don't feel threatened"
item.description: "I am very happy doing what I am doing," says one young electrician who pursued a skilled trade as AI disrupts the job market for college grads.

item.description: The top four leaders in Congress are set to meet with President Trump at the White House on Monday afternoon as Washington barrels toward a 2025 shutd...

item.title: Investigation continues into fatal Michigan church shooting, fire
item.description: Investigators will be back at the scene Monday in Grand Blanc Township, where a shooting and fire at a church left multiple people dead.

item.title: Clint Smith on adapting "How the Word Is Passed" for young readers
